biotools.summary: A database of differentially expressed proteins in human cancers (dbDEPC) collects curated cancer proteomics data, provides a resource for information on protein-level expression changes, and explores protein profile differences among different cancers. dbDEPC currently contains 1803 proteins differentially expressed in 15 cancers, curated from 65 mass spectrometry (MS) experiments in peer-reviewed publications.

bioschemas.name: dbDEPC
